data.event: The municipality of Vega was established on 1 January 1838 (see formannskapsdistrikt).

event.title: 1 January 1965, the Skogsholmen area (population: 196) was transferred

data.event: On 1 January 1965, the Skogsholmen area (population: 196) was transferred from Tjøtta to Vega.

event.title: 1 January 1971, the Skålvær islands (population: 32) in the northeastern part of Vega was transferred

data.event: Then on 1 January 1971, the Skålvær islands (population: 32) in the northeastern part of Vega was transferred to Alstahaug.
The name was written "Vegø" prior to 1891.
